message:
got this macbook , light water damage, ppbus 0ohm to ground , then i insert 1v, 2 amp,  and alcohol allover,  i notice u7220 getting really hot, ( it use ppbus )

IS  MY CPU DEAD already 

is u7220 shot to ground or some mosfate or caps?

Pray you didn't kill it injecting voltage without checking for such sorted MOSFETs first.
So many times explained how to deal with short on PPBUS_G3H...
1Vshouldn't damage CPU, but is no reason to do that in such way.

Post exact ohm value (not diode mode) to ground on PPBUS_G3H and compare that value with the readings on ALL big coils.
If you get the same value on any, remove corresponding high-side MOSFET and check if PPBUS_G3H goes high.
If yes, you've just found the culprit.
